author: vkuznet
body:
Adjust Rucio call `/replica/list` to use the following JSON:
```
{"dids":[{"name":"dataset-name","scope":"cms"}],"domain":null,"all_states":false,
 "resolve_archive":false,"resolve_parents":false,"rse_expression":"site-name"}
```

For details, see discussion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/6602
title: New dasgoclient version
